title: Integrated Deliberate Practice and Mental Practice Education Course for Acquiring Surgical Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational surgical theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Self-directed learning environment utilizing virtual reality and digital tools (without physical simulators) aimed at acquiring immediately applicable skills in medical settings

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate complex surgical incision and suturing techniques with 80% accuracy
Learners can accurately reproduce 90% or more steps of surgical procedures through mental practice simulations
Learners can reduce surgical skill performance errors by 30% or more by incorporating peer evaluations and expert feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
